channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Les Bleus Are Booked! France Qualifies for 2026 FIFA World Cup
item.description: Kylian Mbappé helped send two-time champion France to the 2026 World Cup with a 4-0 home win against Ukraine on Thursday.

item.title: 'I can't do it anymore': Tony Elliott contemplated leaving football entirely. Instead, he built a contender
item.description: The Virginia coach reflects on the personal and professional changes in his life three years after the shooting that killed three of his players.
